title: Brexit & Beyond:U.K. Calls for EU to Recognize Its Regulation Post-Brexit, Investors Keep Eye on Eurozone Recovery, Brexit Hits Bankers in Their Wallets
text:
Brexit & Beyond: Europe in Flux is The Wall Street Journal’s round-up of news and analysis of how Brexit will affect global business, economies and finance. You can sign up here. MUST READS U.K. Brexit secretary David Davis speaks to Wall Street Journal Editor In Chief Gerard Baker. Simon Williams for The Wall Street Journal U.K. […]
